tasks.title: Circular Progressbar widget
tasks.description: Create a widget that should show completeness of a task in percetange from 1 to 100.

tasks.title: Circular Progressbar not rendered with latest jQuery version
tasks.description: When the Circular ProgressBar is used with the latest jQuery version an error is thrown that leads to the widget not being rendered

tasks.title: Add color options to Circular Progressbar widget
tasks.description: Add color pallete options to the Circular Progressbar widget so that the user can choose a coloring that matches the rest of the appearance of their application.

tasks.title: Grid not exporting the data to Excel
tasks.description: With R1 2022, the grid stopped downloading an xlsx file when the user clicks on the 'Export to Excel' button

tasks.title: Allow the DataSource widge to be sorted by multiple fields
tasks.description: Implement an enhancement that would allow the user to sort the data in the data source by multiple fields

tasks.title: DataSource LINQ expressions throw error with .NET 6
tasks.description: The LINQ expressions used by the DataSource throw a server error when used in a .NET 6 project
